text: HI All, I am using crm search.. getting Error is: Too Many Requests (RFC 6585). The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

you are going to need to pay attention to your rate limit.... that means you can do things like queue your requests on your end
this will tell you how many you have:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/apps/api_guidelines>

This will help you figure out how to resolve the issue
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/faq/working-within-the-HubSpot-api-rate-limits>
With the Search API its’ limited to 1 request a second so you’ll want to put some kind of sleep function in between your calls
